oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Breeding Soundness Examination of the Cow
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Frazer, Grant S.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: breeding problems
breeding record
reproductive tract
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Treatment or prevention of breeding problems is only possible after making the correct diagnosis. The accuracy of this diagnosis is based on:1. A detailed review of breeding records and compilation of an accurate history.2. A thorough evaluation of the entire reproductive tract.a. external inspection.b. evaluation of internal genitalia per rectum (palpation and ultrasound)c. vaginal examination.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1998; 82-86
